item.title: Migraine And Mental Health: Causes, Effects On Health, Symptoms & Treatment
item.dc:creator: Joseph Anim Darko
item.description:
In this article, we will discuss what Migraine is, its effects on Mental Health, symptoms, causes, and treatment as explained by the Medical Health Professional and Team Lead of Healthy Choice, Mr. Samuel Ntiamoah. Migraine, known by far as the neurological condition that causes recurrent episodes of severe headaches are typically pulsating or throbbing in nature, and...

The post Migraine And Mental Health: Causes, Effects On Health, Symptoms & Treatment appeared first on The New Vibes.
